# TIROS POR ZONAS DEL CAMPO

```{r}
get_shooting_splits <- function(player_name, season = "2023-24") {
  cat("üéØ Obteniendo splits de tiro por zonas para:", player_name, "\n")
  
  player_list <- common$get_players()
  player <- Filter(function(p) tolower(p$full_name) == tolower(player_name), player_list)
  if (length(player) == 0) {
    cat("‚ùå Jugador no encontrado.\n")
    return(NULL)
  }
  
  player_id <- player[[1]]$id
  Sys.sleep(1)
  
  splits <- nba_api$playershootingdashboard$PlayerShootingSplits(
    player_id = player_id,
    season = season,
    season_type_all_star = "Regular Season"
  )
  
  splits_df <- lapply(splits$get_data_frames(), py_to_r)
  names(splits_df) <- c("shot_distance", "shot_area", "shot_type", "assisted")
  
  cat("‚úÖ Splits de tiro obtenidos.\n")
  return(splits_df)
}
```

```{r}
divisiones_tiro <- get_shooting_splits("Stephen Curry")
```
